entry.content:
[{"id":1555941466744,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"This is my first program, it begun with a one-liner Bash script:","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1591187975042,"type":"publii-code","content":"sudo apt install snapd git python3 cmatrix sl mesa-utils wine software-properties-common python3-setuptools python3-gi python-gobject skype libreoffice steam 0ad virtualbox gparted python3-pip libreoffice-gtk3 dconf-editor etcher opera-stable vscode powertop cmatrix sl -y && cd Downloads && wget https://512pixels.net/downloads/macos-wallpapers/10-13.jpg && cd && gsettings set org.gnome.desktop.background picture-uri Downloads/10-13.jpg","config":{"language":"bash","advanced":{"cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1591187995799,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"As I said, one simple and ugly line of shell script.","config":{"textAlign":"left","advanced":{"style":"","cssClasses":"","id":""}}},{"id":1591188001557,"type":"publii-paragraph","content":"Now it's going to be the main place for all of my future projects.
